attributes.action: ask shops to make T-shirts and bags to support issues raised by Greenpeace and all the proceeds go to greenpeace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make T-shirts for Greenpeace like Dorethy Perkins have got T-shirts and bags for the Woodland Trust. i think a lot of people would buy them and it also shows that you want to change an issue in the world. If you would like shops to sell T-shirts and bags please sign this petition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
